long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ThinkFuel Code Checker - Discover What's Tracking You

Overview:
ThinkFuel Code Checker is an essential Chrome extension for digital marketers, web developers, and privacy-conscious users. It enables you to instantly determine whether a website is using some of the most common digital tracking and advertising technologies. By simply clicking on the ThinkFuel Code Checker icon in your browser, you can quickly see if a website has HubSpot, Google Analytics, Google Ads, or Google Tag Manager scripts installed.

Why Use ThinkFuel Code Checker?

Transparency in Tracking: Understand what tracking scripts a website uses as soon as you land on it. This transparency is crucial for privacy-conscious users and professionals who need to audit sites for compliance and tracking implementations.

Ease of Use: No need to dig through complex page source code or use developer tools to find tracking technologies. ThinkFuel Code Checker does this instantly with one click.

Improve Your Workflows: For digital marketers and web developers, this tool is invaluable for quickly verifying the implementation of tracking codes—ensuring that your analytics and ad tracking are set up correctly.

Save Time: Instead of manually searching through HTML code, get immediate results, allowing you to focus on analysis and other tasks.

Educational Insight: Learn about what technologies are powering websites and how different tracking technologies are implemented. This can be incredibly beneficial for those new to web technologies or looking to expand their knowledge.

Key Features:

Instant detection of HubSpot, Google Analytics, Google Ads, and Google Tag Manager.
Simple, user-friendly interface that provides a clear, concise report.
No configuration needed — works immediately upon installation.
Lightweight and does not impact browser performance.
Who Should Install ThinkFuel Code Checker?

Digital marketers wanting to ensure that tracking codes on their campaigns are properly implemented.
Web developers and website owners auditing their sites or competitors' for tracking technologies.
Tech-savvy individuals interested in the privacy aspects of the websites they visit.
Get ThinkFuel Code Checker today and take control of your browsing experience and digital work environment!
